Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory531.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiHitNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Witch Haida', 3: "You're so incredibly... stubborn!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Witch Haida\'s halberd blade meets "Death\'s" powerful blow, sending a jolt up her arms. Her wrists throb as she cries out her accusation in pain.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Witch Haida', 3: "You're like wet sealing wax—impossible to shake off! Don't you ever quit?!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: '"Death"', 3: "I'm not wasting my breath on someone who drags angels into Hell! Hand over the Chaos Gate Emissary, surrender, or perish! Stop stirring up trouble in Atlantis!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The air shimmers with "Death\'s" war cry, waves of pure rage rippling through the falling inferno.'}
{1: '1', 2: '"Death"', 3: "Look at what you've become! Would Lustrous regret saving you when you were nothing but a lifeless husk? You weren't even meant to live!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Witch Haida', 3: 'Lustrous...?', 4: '1'}
{3: "The mermaid's focus wavers—a fatal misstep in the heat of battle."}
{3: "The Knight seizes the moment, driving her iron blade—still slick with angel blood—into the mermaid's arm. It's not a powerful thrust, but it lands with chilling accuracy."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Witch Haida', 3: 'Ouch! That hurts!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{3: 'You lay down a precise burst of shots, pushing back the angels trying to back up the Witch Haida.'}
{3: 'The tide has clearly turned—Cerberus is leading the charge as the demon army cleans up the last scattered enemy forces in the valley.'}
{1: '1', 2: '"Death"', 3: "Don't let the Sanctuary pull the wool over your eyes—don't fall for their attempts to split us up and gut Hell's power. We've already lost too many good soldiers.", 4: '1'}
{3: '"Death" has the Witch Haida pinned down, a frown of concern etched on her face.'}
{1: '1', 2: '"Death"', 3: "It's not too late to give in. I don't want us to settle this with a bloodbath.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Witch Haida', 3: 'The Sanctuary has nothing to do with this! I swiped the Omega Egg myself, and the Hell Train was just... part of a trade with someone else.', 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: '"Death"', 3: "Just part of a trade? Do you have any clue what's gone down in the mortal realm since the Hell Train bit the dust? Bloodsworn, tell her what you've seen with your own eyes!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'That land is now stuck under an endless, scorching sun.', 3: '53'}
{2: "Plagues are running wild, locusts are swarming everywhere—it's become so unlivable that even demons can't hack it there.", 3: '54'}
{1: '1', 2: '"Death"', 3: "Catch that? The dead can't even get into Hell anymore—they're stuck roaming the surface as walking corpses.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Witch Haida', 3: "Y-you can't pin this on me! Even if I hadn't hopped on the Hell Train, your power as a Ferryman was already circling the drain—it wouldn't have lasted anyway!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Witch Haida', 3: "You've got to believe me. I need Atlantis, I need a spot where I can get to the Acheron River...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: '"Death"', 3: 'Some people just never learn!', 4: '1'}
{3: '"Death" stops pulling his punches, his blade slicing into the Witch Haida\'s arm. If she\'d been any slower, her fingers would\'ve been lopped off.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Witch Haida', 3: "No... I haven't really done much wrong. I just wanted to bring them back.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Witch Haida', 3: "I should never have stashed you away in the mortal realm... But I'm not handing over the Demon Fortress to you, no matter what!", 4: '1'}
{3: "As if she's made up her mind, Witch Haida slams her palm against the ground."}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{3: 'The ground shakes violently at her command, and the Acheron River, which wraps around the Demon Fortress walls, splashes crimson water onto the shore.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Witch Haida', 3: "If you're still dead set on stopping me, then take a dip in that river... and turn into a stone with no feelings at all.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Morigan', 3: "Caw—what's she getting at?", 4: '18'}
{3: "The raven swoops through the air, ducking and weaving to avoid the Acheron River's waters."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Witch Haida', 3: "Someday, I'll remake all of you, free from all the hate and conflict.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Witch Haida', 3: "Go—the void's... calling your name!", 4: '1'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{3: 'She lifts her Halberd Blade again, and on the battlefield that should have been the end, huge waves suddenly surge at her command, leaving no place to hide.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Demon', 3: "Damn it, she's drowning us again! Get back! Everybody retreat!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Angel', 3: 'The flood! Here comes the flood!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Foam droplets spray from the river onto the shore, hitting "Death" and instantly burning pitch-black holes right through her.'}
{3: "Even as new flesh constantly grows back, there's no escaping the searing pain of the burns."}
{2: '"Death"', 3: "Lamia, I've cut a deal with the Bloodsworn. You can never truly kill me.", 4: '1'}
{2: '"Death"', 3: "I swear I'll stand before you again. You can't outlast me.", 4: '1'}
{3: "The waters of the Acheron River are already past the Death's calves, and a powerful pull from beneath the surface drags her and the Bloodsworn down into the abyss."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Witch Haida', 3: "I-I don't care! Every time you come back, I'll just kick your butt again!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Witch Haida looks away, flustered.'}
{3: 'The crimson tide keeps rising, hotter than Hellfire, burning your nose and throat with excruciating pain.'}
{1: '1', 2: '"Death"', 3: 'Take my hand, Gray Raven!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1004', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '0.9', 5: '2'}
{3: 'The abyss, utterly beyond description, swallows everything from all sides, making it impossible to breathe.'}
{3: 'Only your covenant and your unwavering faith keep your fingers from slipping apart.'}
{1: '1', 2: '"Death"', 3: "We were just talking about those stones sinking into the river, and now we're getting a taste of it ourselves.", 4: '1'}
{2: '"Death"', 3: "Ever wonder what's on the other side of death?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'No one can answer anymore.'}
{1: '1004', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0.9', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryFallNew.prefab', 2: '1'}
{3: '"Death" clings tightly to you as you both sink into the depths of the Acheron abyss.'}
